name: Go Back!
description:
Go Back! was made for the 4th Brackeys game jam. It's about a soldier who has to save his country by shooting down an enemy bomber. Many obstacles will be there but he can go back trough time and stop those obstacles from even getting in his way in the first place. 

This is my first finished game ever so it’s not the best but it was very fun to work on and I'll probably continue to work on it.
